5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir bin Samurah said:“The Prophet (ﷺ) used to deliver the sermon standing, then he would sit down, then he would stand up and recite some Verses and remember Allah. His sermon was moderate, and his prayer was moderate (i.e., neither too long nor too short).”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the sermon on Friday
